Description.Name: Eagle Eye
Description.Details:
People like to talk about the pirate life as though it were some romantic, free-wheeling vacation where you stick it to the Man (the Inner Sphere, in this case), and live the high life, complete with blackjack and hookers. At least, that's what people who've never suffered from a pirate attack like to dream, or those who've never tried living as one. The reality is piracy is dirty, cruel, dangerous, and takes the right type of merciless cunning to make sure the only dagger is the one in your hand, not in your back. And Karl fits that bill.

The safest way to live in the Tortuga Dominions is not to spend too much time in the Tortuga Dominions, and Karl knew the hallways and hidey-holes of most of the Jumpships in the Tortugan fleets better than he knew the way around the apartment he crashed in when he was forced planetside during down time. And he knew where all the best gambling was to be found. Which, naturally, is probably the reason he's now in the Rimward Periphery, looking for more “reputable” work. And if it is, he ain't saying. He knows his way around a ‘Mech though, and as far as he tells it, that's all any potential employers need to know about him.
